*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Elias R. Wightman, July 10, 1833. Can not understand field notes of Matthew Hubert.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-10-1831"> 10 June (31*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir,*/p*
*p*I find in examining the memorandums of surveys returned by your deputy *person_mentioned*Mathew Hubbert*/person_mentioned* that no one can understand them You are the responsable *person_mentioned*person*/person_mentioned*, and I fear will get into very serious difficulty, for if another *person_mentioned*surveyor */person_mentioned*is sent to do the work over again, it will be at your expense*/p*
*p*Lose no time in attending to this matter and come up as quick as possible and make a final close of all your work and complete all your returns. If you delay I shall be compelled to send another *person_mentioned*surveyor */person_mentioned*there at your expense a thing which you are aware would be very injurious to you and unpleasant to me.*/p*
*p*Please remember me particularly to*person_mentioned* Mrs. Weightman*/person_mentioned* and the rest of your *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr. E. R. Weightman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
